00010 #if !defined(MATRIX_H)
00011 #define MATRIX_H
00012 
00013 #include <sstream>
00014 #include <iomanip>
00015 
00016 #include "Vector.H"
00017 
00018 namespace VecMath {
00020     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Matrix {
00021         public:
00022             Matrix<D, N> ();
00023             Matrix<D, N> (N, N, N, N, N, N);
00024             Matrix<D, N> (unsigned, unsigned, N);
00025             virtual ~Matrix<D, N> () { }
00026 
00027             N &operator () (unsigned i, unsigned j) {
00028                 return M[i][j]; 
00029             }
00030 
00031             Matrix<D, N> operator * (const Matrix<D, N> &) const;
00032             Vector<D, N> operator * (const Vector<D, N> &);
00033 
00034             Matrix<D, N> operator - ();
00035 
00036             std::string Print ();
00037 
00038         protected:
00039             N M[D][D];
00040     };
00041 
00042 
00044     template<unsigned D, typename N> Matrix<D, N>::Matrix () {
00045         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                                      //      i: row
00046             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                            //      j: col
00047                 M[i][j] = 0;
00048             M[i][i] = 1;
00049         }
00050     }
00051 
00059     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00060             Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (N Rxy, N Rxz, N Rxw, N Ryz, N Ryw, N Rzw) {
00061         std::cerr << "Matrix<" << D <<">::Matrix<" << D
00062                   <<"> (Rxy, Rxz, Rxw, Ryz, Ryw, Rzw) not yet implemented!" 
00063                   << std::endl;
00064         abort();
00065     }
00066 
00071     template<unsigned D, typename N>
00072             Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (unsigned ii, unsigned jj, N Theta) {
00073         N c = cos (Theta*pi/180.), s = sin (Theta*pi/180.);
00074         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                                      //      i: row
00075             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                            //      j: col
00076                 M[i][j] = 0;
00077             M[i][i] = 1;
00078         }
00079         M[ii][ii] =  M[jj][jj] = c;
00080         M[ii][jj] = -s;
00081         M[jj][ii] = s;
00082     }
00083 
00087     template <unsigned D, typename N> Matrix<D, N>
00088             Matrix<D, N>::operator * (const Matrix<D, N> &B) const {
00089         Matrix<D, N> C;
00090         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                                        //      i: row
00091             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {                          //      j: col
00092                 N s = 0;
00093                 for (unsigned k = 0; k < D; k++)
00094                     s += M[i][k]*B.M[k][j];
00095                 C.M[i][j] = s;
00096             }
00097         return C;
00098     }
00099 
00103     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00104             Vector<D, N> Matrix<D, N>::operator * (const Vector<D, N> &V) {
00105         Vector<D, N> W;
00106         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                              //      i: row
00107             N s = 0;
00108             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                    //      j: col
00109                 s += M[i][j]*V[j];
00110             W[i] = s;
00111         }
00112         return W;
00113     }
00114 
00117     template <unsigned D, typename N> 
00118             Matrix<D, N> Matrix<D, N>::operator - () {
00119         Matrix<D, N> B (*this);
00120         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                                        //      i: row
00121             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {                          //      j: col
00122                 B.M[i][j] = -M[i][j];
00123             }
00124         return B;
00125     }
00126 
00127 
00129     template <unsigned D, typename N> std::string Matrix<D, N>::Print () {
00130         std::ostringstream o;
00131         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00132             o << "|";
00133             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) 
00134                 o << std::setw (10) << std::setprecision (3) << M[i][j];
00135             o << "|\n";
00136         }
00137         o << std::ends;
00138         return o.str ();
00139     }

00141 }       // namespace VecMath
